name: market for heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, 3MW electrical | heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, 3MW electrical | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2280/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, 3MW electrical', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the production of a heat and power co-generation unit, organic Rankine cycle, with a capacity of 3 MWel and 30 MWth . The infrastructure represents a plant that is used for a geothermal Hot-Dry-Rock power plant, with a lifetime of 20 years. The process includes building materials, their decommission and energy required for the construction.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
